Crisis Might.effect: Physical damage +50% when low on HP

Critical Heal.effect: Restores some HP after successfully delivering a critical hit

Cursed Dance.effect: Inflicts Curse damage to random targets equal to 1/4 of the target's current HP. Hits 2-5 times, max 3 times on one enemy

Dream Feast.effect: Steals a large amount of MP from one enemy

Extra Charge.effect: All attacks do double damage during Extra Turns

Extra Savings.effect: All attacks have no cost during Extra Turns

Final Strike.effect: Inflicts Physical damage to one enemy equal to the user's current HP

Grimoire.effect: Greatly increases chance of inflicting status ailments

Health Save.effect: HP cost for Physical skills -75% for both sides

Holy Strike.effect: Inflicts moderate Almighty damage to one enemy. Damage is dependent on Strength rather than Magic

Mow Down.effect: Inflicts moderate Physical damage to all enemies

Multi-Strike.effect: Inflicts light Physical damage to all enemies 2-7 times. Number of hits depends on Agility

Piercing Hit.effect: Inflicts moderate Physical damage to one enemy. Cannot be resisted, nulled, or absorbed

Recarmloss.effect: Revives fallen team members, fully restores team's HP, and cures all ailments, but reduces caster's HP to 1

Shield All+.effect: Casts Shield All at the start of the battle

Strengthen.effect: Negates all elemental weaknesses within the team

Vigilant.effect: Character gains a great additional portion of EXP earned by the main character while not assigned to a team
